name: unicorn

(ANIMAL)
Add to word list

unicorn noun [C]
(BUSINESS)
business, finance & economics
  specialized a start-up (= new business) whose value is considered to be over $1 billion Compare

hectocorn

unicorn noun [C]
(SOMETHING DIFFICULT TO FIND)
someone or something that is difficult or impossible to find: The good $15 Pinot Noir is the unicorn of the California wine industry - highly sought after, but no one is actually sure whether it exists or not.

consisting of a combination of a number of colours, typically including purple, pink, white, light blue and light green, that are used together to decorate food, clothing, etc. : The easiest way to get that unicorn effect is through soft pastel colours like pinks, greens, and blues. We offer seven different hanging party decorations in unicorn colours.
More examplesFewer examplesToday we're tapping into one of this year's most exciting health crazes - unicorn lattes! The unicorn trend is characterized by pastel colours, rainbows, iridescent hues.Our Unicorn Confetti Sprinkles are a mix of pastel strands in a range of different shapes.
